page.title: 03Education
page.content: There are at least two playgroups in this area:- Bradbourne Park and Bat and Ball playgroups. They are for children aged 3-5 years. They do painting and drawing and games for most of the morning. Primary schools are for children aged 5-11 years. Within this block there are five. Kemsing has its own village school and Seal has two. In Sevenoaks there is a county primary school and a church school. Secondary schools are for children aged 11-18 years but you can leave when you are 16. In the block there is one for boys and another for girls. There is also a residential school for the blind and one private school. An Adult Education Centre comes within the block. A variety of afternoon and evening courses for adults are arranged there.
